title: No Title in Document Head
content:
# No Title in Document Head

> Prevent usage of `<title>` with `Head` component from `next/document`.
preview: > Prevent usage of `<title>` with `Head` component from `next/document`.

title: No Title in Document Head
content:
## [Why This Error Occurred](#why-this-error-occurred)

A `<title>` element was defined within the `Head` component imported from `next/document`, which should only be used for any `<head>` code that is common for all pages. Title tags should be defined at the page-level using `next/head` instead.
preview: A `<title>` element was defined within the `Head` component imported from `next/document`, which should only be used for any `<head>` code that is common for all pages. Title tags should be defined at the page-level using `next/head` instead.

title: No Title in Document Head
content:
## [Possible Ways to Fix It](#possible-ways-to-fix-it) Within a page or component, import and use `next/head` to define a page title: pages/index.js ``` import Head from 'next/head' export function Home() { return (
My page title
) } ```
preview: Within a page or component, import and use `next/head` to define a page title: pages/index.js [Code Block]
